title: Mihrab of the mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar al-Ansari
site: Mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar Al-Ansari
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: 52 Mosq. Abu Bakr Mazhar (sanctuaire) - Dittrich. Translation of photographer's description: 52 Mosque of Aboubakr Mazhar (the sanctuary). Collector's note: Mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar. Dittrich.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Mihrab of the mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar al-Ansari
